data.enText: showing strong interest and attention
an intent gaze/look

data.chText: 他的目光突然专注起来。
data.enText: His eyes were suddenly intent.

data.chText: 决心做（尤指伤害他人的事）
data.enText: determined to do sth, especially sth that will harm other people
They were intent on murder.

data.chText: 你是不是存心要败坏我的名誉？
data.enText: Are you intent upon destroying my reputation?
giving all your attention to sth

data.chText: 我专心工作，以致忘了时间。
data.enText: I was so intent on my work that I didn't notice the time.
She looked at him intently.
or
what you intend to do

data.chText: 她否认拥有毒品是为了提供给别人。
data.enText: She denies possessing the drug with intent to supply.
a letter/statement of intent

data.chText: 他的目的显然不是要安抚批评他的人。
data.enText: His intent is clearly not to placate his critics.
to all intents and purposes
for all intents and purposes
in the effects that sth has, if not in reality; almost completely

data.chText: 到1981年，这些码头几乎等于关闭了。
data.enText: By 1981 the docks had, to all intents and purposes, closed.

data.chText: 这两件物品几乎完全一样。
data.enText: The two items are, to all intents and purposes, identical.

simple_means.memory_skill: in 不 + tent 伸展 → 意图

means: 决心做(尤指伤害他人的事)

ex.chText: 该公司已宣布打算向银行贷款。
ex.enText: The company has declared its intent to get a bank loan.

ex.chText: 他打破窗户意图入室行窃。
ex.enText: He broke the window with the intent to enter and steal.

ex.chText: 他否认持有枪械是为了抢劫。
ex.enText: He denies possessing the gun with the intent to commit robbery.

synonyms.bx: 指某人做某事的目的；也可作法律术语，指犯罪意图。

ex.chText: 他认为这件事是事先安排的。
ex.enText: He believed that this had happened by design.

ex.chText: 关于他对公司的这些宏图大计，你有什么想法？
ex.enText: What is your opinion on his grand designs for the company?

synonyms.bx: 指在头脑中形成的计划，有时含贬义。

ex.chText: 我来伦敦是为了学习英国文学。
ex.enText: I came to London with the intention of studying English literature.
She has no intention of making an apology to John.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指做某事的打算或计划。

data.enText: to all intents and purposes
for all intents and purposes
in the effects that sth has, if not in reality; almost completely

data.chText: 到1981年，这些码头几乎等于关闭了。
data.enText: By 1981 the docks had, to all intents and purposes, closed.

data.chText: 这两件物品几乎完全一样。
data.enText: The two items are, to all intents and purposes, identical.

tr: an anticipated outcome that is intended or that guides your planned actions
example: his intent was to provide a new translation
it was created with the conscious aim of answering immediate needs
he made no secret of his designs

tr: the intended meaning of a communication
giving or marked by complete attention to
example: that engrossed look or rapt delight
so intent on this fantastic...narrative that she hardly stirred"- Walter de la Mar

value.def: If you are intent on doing something, you are eager and determined to do it.

example.ex: The rebels are obviously intent on keeping up the pressure...
example.tran: 叛乱分子显然决心继续施压。

example.ex: The play starred a well-known retired actress who was intent on a come-back.
example.tran: 该剧由一名志在复出的著名隐退女演员主演。

value.def: If someone does something in an intent way, they pay great attention to what they are doing.

example.ex: She looked from one intent face to another...
example.tran: 她看着一张张专注的面孔。

example.ex: Rodney had been intent on every word.
He listened intently, then slammed down the phone.
example.tran: 他专心地听着,然后砰地挂上电话。

value.def: A person's intent is their intention to do something.

example.ex: ...a strong statement of intent on arms control...
example.tran: 决心实施军备控制的有力声明

example.ex: Two men will appear before Birmingham magistrates' court today charged with possession of arms with intent to endanger life.
example.tran: 两名男子今天将在伯明翰地方法庭受审,他们被控持有武器，企图危害他人生命。

value.def: You say to all intents and purposes to suggest that a situation is not exactly as you describe it but the effect is the same as if it were.

example.ex: To all intents and purposes he was my father.
example.tran: 他几乎可以称得上是我的父亲。

value.tran: 差不多等于;几乎在一切方面

partsOfSpeech.dec: at 加强 + tend 伸展 → 延伸〔服务〕→ 看护
attend 出席；看护 + ant …的，具有…性质的 → 出席的
at 加强 + tent 伸展 + ion 表状态 → 伸展出去〔听别人讲〕→ 注意力
at 表加强 + tent 伸展 + ive …的 → 注意的；关心的
con 共同 + tend 伸展 → 一起伸展〔个人观点〕→ 争论
dis 分散 + tend 伸展 →〔向各个方向〕分散伸展 → 扩张
ex 出 + tend 伸展 → 伸出去 → 扩张
ex 出 + tens 伸展 + ion 动作或状态 → 伸展；延期
ex 出 + tens 伸展 + ive 有…性质的 → 可四处伸展的 → 广泛的
ex 出 + tent 伸展 →〔身体〕伸展开 → 程度
in 使… + tend 伸展 → 使〔想法〕伸展 → 打算
in 不 + tens 伸展 + e → 拉到了不能再拉的地步 → 强烈的
intens〔e〕强烈的 + ify 使 → 加强
in 不 + tent 伸展 → 意图
in 不 + tent 伸展 + ion 动作或状态 → 意图
pre 前 + tend 伸展 → 向前伸手 → 假装〔乞讨〕
pre 预先 + tent 伸展 + ious …的 → 将优势伸展 → 自负的
tend 伸展 + ence 表状态 → 伸展的状态 → 趋向
tend 伸展 + ency 表状态 → 倾向
tens 伸展 + ible 可…的 → 可伸展的
tens 伸展 + ion 表名词 → 伸展到极点 → 张力
